Title: SDL 2: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libsdl2, the worst of
    which could result in a Denial of Service condition.

Background.Text: Simple DirectMedia Layer is a cross-platform development library designed to provide low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, and graphics hardware via OpenGL and Direct3D.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in SDL 2. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All SDL 2 users should upgrade to the latest version:
